meanings.sent1: She wore a colorful pair of bikinis to the beach.
meanings.sent2: Many women prefer to wear bikinis during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The store had a sale on bikinis, so she bought a few.
meanings.sent4: The bikinis on display shimmered under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite bikinis had floral patterns and ruffles.

meanings.definition: A type of women's underwear consisting of a bra and panties.
meanings.sent1: She bought a set of lacy bikinis from the lingerie store.
meanings.sent2: Her drawer was filled with bikinis in various colors.
meanings.sent3: She giggled when she saw her cat playing with her bikinis.
meanings.sent4: The delicate lace on the bikinis made them feel luxurious.
meanings.sent5: She felt confident wearing her new bikinis under her dress.
